p: Aerial parts of Tagetes lucida Cav. (Asteraceae) were collected in San Cristóbal, Municipality of Ecatepec Mexico State, Mexico. People use this plant during the time of flowering, and it is commonly collected from the field or bought in the markets. Since flowering occurs from July to December, the vegetal material for this study was collected in September 2016. Taxonomist Ana Rosa López identified the species with voucher specimen No. 82038 deposited at the Herbarium of the Biology Department of the Universidad Autónoma Metropolitana-Iztapalapa.
